body.p:
There are several ways of reviewing machine manufacturing quality in Sight Machine:
Dashboard -> OEE Detail screen's
Operational tab (pareto chart showing quality as measured by maching downtime)
Quality tab (bar chart showing quality as measured by defects by type)
Data tab (quality as measured by defective parts over machine, start and end time, etc.)
Analysis tab (quality measured over time)
Toolbar Chart button (quality measured by machine or location)
